                                                                                                    404网站的视频，懒得搬了                                                                            https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D63QgrdBBGU                                                                            https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xBNBtg6Ln38

OverviewThis is a mod that adds mostly female character form multiple media such as Kobayashi's Dragon Maid, Touhou Project, Fate/Grand Order, Honkai Impact, etc.

Mod is still in beta and if there is a bug, do visit the discord link, if you want to support the developer, become his patron in his patreon and patron will get a look on what is in progress, and might able to pre-test the mod.

Update to expect:
-KonoSuba Update

COMPANION -Sanae Kochiya-Nero Claudius-Amelia Sweet (original character)-Kanna Kamui-Tohru-Lucoa-Elma-Aqua-Megumin-M4 Sopmod 2 Jr-Exusiai-Enterprise-Haru Estia-Mash Kyrielight-Yae Sakura-Rin Tohsaka how to tame:use Companion Contract. other items:Apple,Golden Apple, Baked Potato, Cookieheals companion, FeatherLets companion wander around (if right clicked with a feather, companion will sit first and then right click her without the feather and she will wanders around) Book
Sopmod jr will tell you her wisdom jukebox playing musicAqua will dance as if she is partying. Stick
it trigger the sit and stand
Fluffy Spirituse it on Rin Tohsaka and she will speak at a random time.

COMMISSION UPDATE:
NEED YOUR WAIFU TO BE RELEASE EARLY? DO YOU WANT HAVE YOUR OC AS A WAIFU IN THIS MOD?
JOIN THE DISCORD SERVER NOW FOR A CHANCE TO GET YOUR WAIFU IN THE MOD!!!

Discord Session
[size=1.2]https://discord.gg/kue2dDB

replies.author: as178fe8
replies.txt_content: 我翻了翻这MOD的文本，说起来你们可能不信，里面居然有舰B的企业，崩3的八重樱和方舟的能天使……哈哈，中国对外文化输出太牛了
